data.field:
[% return join '', map '
    '.$_.'
', join "\n", htmlcode('adminbar'), map '
  • '.$_.'
    • ', linkNode( getNode('create node','superdoc'), 'create' ), htmlcode( 'linkWiki', "gods' wiki", 'gw', '(*)' ), htmlcode( 'toInbox', 'gods', 'inbox', '(%d)' ), linkNodeTitle("gods' arcade|arcade"), %]
